current.pluginseo_pageTitleDefaultTemplate: %% page_title %% | Muvez indoors slippers re-imagine functional footwear, convenience and comfort | %% shop.name %%
current.pluginseo_pageTitleIndexTemplate: Indoor Slippers Re-Imagined: men's and women's comfortable and lightweight indoor slippers
current.pluginseo_pageTitlePageTemplate: %% page_title %% | Muvez indoors slippers re-imagine functional footwear, convenience and comfort
current.pluginseo_pageTitleProductTemplate: %% product.title %%%% product.selected_variant.title || prepend_not_empty: ' ' %% | convertible lightweight indoor slippers
current.pluginseo_pageTitleCollectionTemplate: Shop %% current_tags || join: ', ' || append_not_empty: ' ' %%%% collection.title || escape %% at %% shop.name %%
current.pluginseo_pageTitleCatalogTemplate: Browse %% collection.products || map: 'collections' || map: 'title' || uniq || take: '5' || join: ', ' || escape || remove: 'Home page, ' || remove: 'home page, '  || remove: 'Home page' || remove: 'Home page'  %% at %% shop.name %%
current.pluginseo_pageTitleBlogTemplate: %% shop.name %% %% blog.title %%%% blog.all_tags || take: '5' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' blog: ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %%
current.pluginseo_pageTitleArticleTemplate: %% article.title %%%% article.tags || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' | ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %% | %% shop.name %% %% blog.title %% blog
current.pluginseo_metaDescriptionDefaultTemplate: %% page_description %% Our supportive customer service, free shipping option and easy to navigate website
current.pluginseo_metaDescriptionIndexTemplate: MUVEZ are men's and women's convertible and lightweight indoor slippers that deliver unrivaled comfort and convenience.
current.pluginseo_metaDescriptionPageTemplate: %% page.content || strip_newlines || strip_html || escape || append_not_empty: '.' %% Visit %% shop.name %% to If you're working from home you owe it to yourself to be comfortable
current.pluginseo_metaDescriptionSearchTemplate: Find %% search.terms || default: 'it' %% here%% search.results || map: 'title' || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' including ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %% at %% shop.name %%
current.pluginseo_metaDescriptionProductTemplate: We offer free shipping and easy returns %% product.description || strip_newlines || replace: '.,', ',' || strip_html || escape %%
current.pluginseo_metaDescriptionCollectionTempl: %% collection.all_tags || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: 'Shop ' || append_not_empty: ' and more ' %%%% collection.title || escape %% at %% shop.name %%:  convertible lightweight indoor slippers %% collection.description || strip_html || strip_newlines || escape || strip %% Our supportive customer service, free shipping option and easy to navigate website
current.pluginseo_metaDescriptionCatalogTemplate: Discover %% collection.products || map: 'title' || uniq || take: '3' || join: ', ' || escape %% and more.
current.pluginseo_metaDescriptionBlogTemplate: %% blog.articles || map: 'title' || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: 'Read about ' || append_not_empty: ' and more on the '%%%% shop.name %% %% blog.title %% blog.
current.pluginseo_metaDescriptionArticleTemplate: %% article.excerpt_or_content || strip_newlines || strip_html || escape %%%% article.tags || take: '6' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' Read about ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %% %% article.title %% on the %% shop.name %% %% blog.title %% blog
current.pluginseo_metaDescription404Template: The page you requested can't be found, please visit %% shop.domain %% instead
current.checkout_heading_font: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'
current.checkout_body_font: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'
